title: Full augmented reality
desc: As augmented reality is taking leaps, I figured how to get movement of the whole hand captured: Small 360 pressure sensors at every joint ... or, why not the whole body. Providing some feedback (with tiny vibrating pads), you could be able to "touch" objects. So basically, you could not tell the difference between the real world.
imgtitle: Man, I'm stuck at this level for a long time.
